attributes.action: Make employers pay more for foreign workers
attributes.additional_details:
Place a premium on the Employers National Insurance Contribution when they employ a foreign worker.

This will encourage employers to employ British workers - something that has not happened this last decade as foreign-born workers have taken most jobs.

The premium could be be adjusted according to type of job (skilled vs. unskilled) and to times of labour shortages (booms vs. busts).
